meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed and unsure if I can keep up in music-related courses
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Jonathan, a senior majoring in Music. Last semester was really challenging — I took a few music courses that were really difficult, and I’m still struggling to keep up. Some of the songs I’m playing are really complex and I’m still not sure if I can keep up with the tempo or understanding. I’m also worried about what comes next after graduation. I’m interested in business or arts management, but I don’t know if I’m even eligible to apply for jobs or internships if I major in music. I’m trying to talk to professors, but I feel overwhelmed and not sure where to start. I need help understanding how to handle this stress and figure out what to do next.
